name: Crypto ATR-Bollinger Expansion Breakout
description: Trend-following breakout strategy for daily BTC/USD and ETH/USD crypto pairs. It identifies volatility-expansion breakouts using a 20-day Bollinger Band (2.5 σ) and a 14-day ATR. Long entries occur when the daily close exceeds the upper band plus 1.5×ATR with a confirming 30 % volume spike; shorts mirror this logic below the lower band. Risk is capped at 1.5 % of equity per trade via ATR-based position sizing, with exits governed by a 1.2×ATR trailing stop or a 3×ATR take profit, whichever comes first.
